pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, October 13, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

10:15 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually deliver remarks at the Malmö International Forum on Holocaust Remembrance and Combating Antisemitism, “Remember – ReAct”.

The event will be livestreamed via the following link: https://government.se/government-policy/remember--react/plenary-session-ii--react

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Federation of Canadian Municipalities’ Big City Mayors’ Caucus.

Closed to media.
